description:
Old Home apparently has been used as a kind of boarding school a long time ago; now it serves as "nest" for a group of Haibane. There are other such locations in the town of Guri, one of them being the http://anidb.net/ch26012 [Abandoned Factory].
At the beginning of this story, five older Haibane are living at Old Home, with the newcomer http://anidb.net/ch9898 [Rakka] being the sixth "companion" there. There`s also group of young Haibane called "Young Feathers" living there who are taken care of by the oldest Haibane http://anidb.net/ch9899 [Reki] and the only human at Old Home, the old http://anidb.net/ch14487 [Housemother].
name: Old Home
